text.style: font-size: 80px; font-weight: bold; font-family: sans-serif; stroke-dasharray:5,5; fill: peachpuff; stroke: crimson; stroke-width:4.1px; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-linejoin: bevel;
font-size: 80px; font-weight: bold; font-family: sans-serif; fill: peachpuff; stroke: blue; stroke-width:4.1px; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-linejoin: bevel;
